actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-555.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate (Provisions inserted in H.R. 4016 as passed Senate).

official_title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Sac and Fox Indians in Indian Claims Commission Dockets 219, 153, and 135.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-555) Prescribes the method of distributing funds previously appropriated to pay specified Indian Claims Commission judgments to the Sac and Fox Tribe of Oklahoma, the Sac and Fox Tribe of the Mississippi in Iowa, and the Sac and Fox Tribe of the Missouri in Kansas and Nebraska. States that none of the funds distributed or held in trust under this Act shall be subject to Federal or State income taxes or be considered as the basis for denying or reducing the financial assistance or benefits due under any Federal or federally-assisted program.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the disposition of funds appropriated to pay judgments in favor of the Sac and Fox Indians in Indian Claims Commission Dockets 219, 153, and 135.
